mapper.select: select * from tblattraction where name not like '%(운영종료)%'
mapper.insert: insert into tblattractionclose (attraction_close_seq, start_date, end_date, attraction_seq) values (seqtblAttractionClose.nextVal, to_date(#{start_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{end_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{attraction_seq, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select a.*, (select name from tblAttraction where attraction_seq = a.attraction_seq)as name from tblAttractionClose a where attraction_close_seq = #{attraction_close_seq}
mapper.update: update tblattractionclose set start_date = #{start_date}, end_date = #{end_date} where attraction_close_seq = #{attraction_close_seq}
